website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight folding table and chair set comes in really handy for camping or picnics.
pros: Waterproof table is great for outdoor use
Made from aluminum and a lightweight fiberboard
Folds in half and latches shut
Carrying handle makes the table easily portable
Chairs can be stored inside the folded table
cons: Table is sturdy but isn't made to carry much weight on top

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable picnic table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for two adults. It is not backpacking portable, but will fit perfectly in you SUV, Truck, Mini Van. Very comfortable chairs, no problem supporting a 200 lb person. Comes with 4 chairs but we only use two, that'a all we really need plus it's easier to store them inside the table when you fold it. Table has sturdy enough construction to support cooking gear, dishes, water jar, food and all necessities for a quick bite on the go. Umbrella is an extra option available from the same company. I highly recommend to get one as well as the table.
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, a very nice set for a family!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect but this set was much nicer than I thought it would be! It was a gift for my brother and his family, and I don't think it was up for 30 seconds before my 3 year old nephew was ON the table haha! Seems very durable, a fantastic addition to any car camping kit. Love that the seats close into the table! My little nephews, 2 & 3 years old, were able to get into the seats without too much trouble, and they were also comfortable and sturdy for adults present, thin and not-so-thin :)
customer_reviews.author: ItsMoreFunOutdoors

customer_reviews.title: worthless stools
customer_reviews.text: The table is just ok, but the stools are worthless! I sat on one for a while and then needed help to get up. Young children sitting on the stools can barely see over the table. We purchased the table hoping to use it as a game table on our family camping trip. We ended up using the table for storage. UPDATE We were contacted by REDCAMP noting that we found their product to be unaccfeptable. They made an offer to send us a picnic blanket to make amends. I thought this was amazing. I never thought a company would reach out and acknowledge a shortcoming.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table for my family and I to go camping. We took it to Pismo Beach, for some beach camping, and worked well, except when the wind came. There was a slight wind that came and picked up the umbrella that we had in the middle of the table, which there is a hole that is designated for that. However, the umbrella picked a bit, and our table did as well. Now it's bent in the middle, and does not alight properly when unfolded. Regardless, this product did become helpful, and was nice to have on our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin G. Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Table
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a camping trip & it was everything we were looking for and more! We loved how it came with the four stools, and how easy everything packs together for storage & transport! We will definitely use this table & chairs a lot, both when camping & when he have company with kiddos over. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice for camping or adult use
customer_reviews.text: Table is good, but the "chairs" are worthless. Adults cannot use them unless they are a lightweight with a tiny butt. These "chairs" will tip over very easily - not safe for camping. I could have purchased the exact same table at Aldis for $30.00. I thought I had done some good research on this, but I missed something somewhere... Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty716

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Everything they say in the ad is true. Durable, smart design, efficiency, lightweight design, etc. A must for rugged campers that need to save space and weight. The chairs are EXTREMELY comfortable for a 200lb+ adult and I don't know why people bash the chairs in the reviews. Comfortable, solid chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa A. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camping table if you need something small and lightweight. Used it for a week of canoe camping. The size made it great for transporting in the canoe and over 4 long portages. The table is a bit small and the chairs are also very small. But they work great for children and I used them a bit (5 foot 11 inch- 180 lbs), but they get a little uncomfortable after a while. The table was very stable on even ground.
customer_reviews.author: Exitmult

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this table and stool set, however the stools barely lasted a month each. I weight 115 pounds so they are good for me, but this is not meant for heavier tall people, it legs are of very thin material and they bent and broke. I am now left with two stools. Also for the table, one of the screws came out in the first two weeks. I replaced them with the extra nut provides, but they came out as well. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dolker

customer_reviews.title: The table is great. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The table is great. Good quality, perfect size and easy to set up and break down. The chairs serve their purpose, but since they are so small, they aren't the most comfortable. They are easy to fold up and stow inside the table when it's broken down though.
customer_reviews.author: Striving for Fair & Balanced

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know what to expect but I am happy.
customer_reviews.text: The table is nice. I bought it to use as an alter during this coming Day of the Dead celebration. The size and sturdiness will work great. The chairs are way too small but are very sturdy and can either work as stools for sitting or resting your feet. I actually ended up using one of the chairs to place my laptop on top of it while placing the chair on the table to use as standing table. Works great for that purpose too.
customer_reviews.author: Miss S

customer_reviews.title: NOT ALL ALUMINUM
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cause the top looked like it was aluminum too, so hot stuff wouldn’t hurt the finish. What’s on it looks like a hot pan will melt into the finish. Very disappointed. I believe this table is different than the one shown in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Use your Common sense!

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Table
customer_reviews.text: We just got this Saturday and used it at the beach on Sunday for a big birthday party and it worked out great! It is a good size and very sturdy and held a lot of food. I already had 1 I bought before and wanted 2 because these tables are fantastic for indoor and outdoor parties.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again, it’s great, the chairs are just a bit short, stores so compactly
customer_reviews.text: So compact I love how the chairs automatically fit inside when you fold it up VS having to store and haul separately. They’re a little too short to sit on but this table makes a perfect camping or garage sale table. I use the chairs for fishing and not to sit at this table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: The table is fine, the two positions are either toddler size low or adult dining table height. The stools are flimsy and too short, the legs bent on the first day. I am a 120lbs adult and have to be careful sitting down on the stools. They only work with the low table, they’re way too short for the adult dining height. I would not buy this table again
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Allen

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: the stools are made of cheap metal. Out of the box, one of the stool was already bent. My daughter 7yo sat on another stool and its leg bents inside. I tried to return the product and amazon told me u have to find a big box to return it which I dont have. No money was refunded for defected stools. Sitting in my garage collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Uzma

customer_reviews.title: Table is good so far, stool bent
customer_reviews.text: Table seems good so far for what I need. The stools don't support much. I was sitting on it and it bent, and I fell. I am overweight but not obese so I definitely wasn't expecting it to do that. Hopefully the table lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this item. It just didn’t seem like good quality. I wanted something more sturdy that I knew would last.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: Super flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy; used once and basically all the hinges bent.
customer_reviews.author: M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Stools are tiny.
customer_reviews.text: The table is just ok, but the stools are a joke! Barely big enough for a child. The pix looks like the stools are mounted inside the table for storage, but they aren't! Very hard to fold up the table with the stools not attached. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Great kids camp table
customer_reviews.text: We used this table for 3 kids, ages, 4 to 7, at a large group campsite. They loved having their own table and space away from the adults. They ate on it and used it as a crafts/play table. The "stools" that came with it were okay but unless they were sat on completely for proper weight distribution, they did tend to fall over. Good thing kids bounce well. At some point they did use the stools as pretend cannons, but that's another story....
customer_reviews.author: Louise M Roberts

customer_reviews.title: and I feel like a giant sitting on it
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly compact and light. It is a lot smaller/lower than a big normal table, and I feel like a giant sitting on it, but the dimensions are exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: L.W.

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get the mesh that’s shown in the pic. Just a regular mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: If I had gotten this table to use for my children- 10 years ago when they were 4 and 6 years old- it would have been perfect. This thing was so tiny and short. The "chairs" were a joke. I think they may have been able to accommodate about a quarter of one butt cheek- maybe.
customer_reviews.author: akamissjay

customer_reviews.title: IMPORTANT TO KNOW
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A NICE LIGHTWEIGHT TABLE AND SMALL SIT ON BENCHCHAIRS. HOWEVER I LIKE THAT IT'S EASY TO CARRY WITH CHAIRS INSIDE AND UMBRELLA HOLE. WISH CHAIRS WERE A LIL LARGER. HOWEVER VERY STURDY. OVERALL PLEASED.
customer_reviews.author: CUSTOMER SAYS

customer_reviews.title: Good camper table
customer_reviews.text: I use these for outside tables when camping, very light weight and very useful. Durability could be an issue, but for now looks good.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: perfect for going out
customer_reviews.text: Can’t use really heavy things on it but perfect otherwise. It’s perfect for my husband when he goes to the field or if we go camping
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Its a good camping table. A little short and the chairs are best suited for kids. But its a good stow away table for camping or parties
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great set, not sure the shipping method was best.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this table, but was immediately bummed out to find it damaged after taking it out of the shipping box. Everything else was perfect as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good equipment
customer_reviews.text: It has ok chairs but I didn't buy it for the chairs. The table is sturty, strong and large enough to clean a small animal such and a turkey
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, well-made
customer_reviews.text: The recipient loves it. She is using it for a big yearly garage sale and the chairs will be very handy. Not as lightweight as aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: Moochie

customer_reviews.title: It is good and price is not bad
customer_reviews.text: It is good and price is not bad... The table top could be a bit stronger. Stools are great and very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Turcios

customer_reviews.title: Compact table and chairs
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy little table that we can tuck away when it's not needed. I was not expecting much from the chairs but they turned out to actually be pretty decent and they don't even take up any extra room anyway, as they fit inside the folded table. There is also even a spot in the middle to put an umbrella! I did not notice this until it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hooser

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up, and compact. Great table for camping or for workshop. Disappointed that I received this table “new” but has a chipped hole in it straight out the box. See pics below
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chairs fit inside folded table.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool, works okay, not super well built. Neat that the chairs fit inside so that saves space.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A good set at low price point
customer_reviews.text: Notice that the table and stool is very low (as expected). So, it is more suitable for children
customer_reviews.author: Zhu Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Super compact and study table! The stools are a bit short and do not feel as study as hoped. Although, I would buy again as the table is the perfect size and the height adjusts.
customer_reviews.author: Sora

customer_reviews.title: Broken stools
customer_reviews.text: Cool set up, but the stools/chairs bend and break. Love that it's compact, stools/chairs were folded up inside the table, so its easy to carry. The stools bend and break upon first use. Great idea, but quality sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Table & chair flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The chairs & table both seemed very flimsy and the table legs were a little hard to extend & collapse. There was also some bolts and S hooks in a bag with the table and chairs but no instruction on what they were for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Chair is flimpys and bent after 1 camping trip. Screw in the handle came loose. Very hard to put the 4 chairs back into the table to close. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Trinh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We love this little table to throw in our rig to take camping The kids love the little chairs too. It's nothing super strong but it does it's job well. I would reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie The Great

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cook outs
customer_reviews.text: I Used it for an out back cook out fit perfectly everyone was able to use loved it
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Sturdy enough to withstand camping, and nice looking enough to use as an indoor table.
customer_reviews.author: Ktblandford

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Chairs can only be used for children, and tables are ok.
customer_reviews.author: nikinaco

customer_reviews.title: and it packs up easily. We were able to seat 6 (4 kids ...
customer_reviews.text: light, and it packs up easily. We were able to seat 6 (4 kids and 2 adults).
customer_reviews.author: markc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The seats are extremely small but it worked for what we needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDY Elkin

customer_reviews.title: Perfict for picnic or bbq activity.
customer_reviews.text: Light and sturby. Pretty easy to setup. Perfect for picnic or bbq activity. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for what you pay for it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, great for outdoors for any reason also indoors. Great little buy
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Light durable and compact. The chairs are cool bonus. We take it everywhere so don't need to look for free picnic tables anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Great product and outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a let down ### update ### Customer service went above and beyond. They originally sent only the table without the chairs but later sent the chairs along with an umbrella to make up for it! Really amazing. The quality of the product itself is also very good quality, very very happy about my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: amzluva

customer_reviews.title: Rather flimsy table and the "camp chairs" are tiny. ...
customer_reviews.text: Rather flimsy table and the "camp chairs" are tiny. My grandchildren (7 and 5) just fit into them. I should have realized based on the price. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Florence S.F.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone says,Its a kids table.It does raise up so its taller but the chairs are a joke
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Petersen

customer_reviews.title: This is really awesome!! I like it so much
customer_reviews.text: This is really awesome!! I like it so much. It's comfortable to carry when I go to picnic! It also has 4 chairs which can bring inside. And I often use it at home in order to make my feel fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, Quality Table for Events
customer_reviews.text: Use this table for events and selling products. I have back problems and this is perfect as it is not heavy, but quite sturdy. Highly recommend. Easy to carry. Easy to lift.
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Bonnaroo camping. Exactly what we needed. *Will post an update after the trip next week.
customer_reviews.author: VC85

product_meta.title: REDCAMP Outdoor Picnic Table Adjustable, Folding Camping Table with 4 Chairs, Aluminum White 47.2"x23.6"x27"
product_meta.description: Size:4 Foot (with 4 low stools)Enjoy your indoor and outdoor entertainments with Redcamp aluminum folding picnic table. High Quality & Considerate Details Redcamp 4-foot adjustable folding tables are constructed of medium density fiberboard and aluminum alloy frame. They will not crack, chip or peel. Security latch help the tabletop keep steady when setup, impact-resistant design of round corner on the tabletop ensures safety, triangle locking hinge add more support to ensure the stability. Adjustable foot caps provide balance even on unflat floor. Easy Carrying Compact and small when folded, with portable handle you can carrying this lightweight aluminum camping table without too much strength. Go anywhere you want at any time with this multi-purpose tables with folding stools Great for all activities 2 height available with detachable legs for different needs. Water-proof, stain-resistant, served as a 4 -season camping table, suitable for picnics, beaches, parties, fishing, camping, hiking, outdoor concerts, & more About REDCAMP REDCAMP is a professional outdoor equipment brand. We adhering to the "Enjoy ur tour, Enjoy ur dream." as the design concept, we design and develop the high quality outdoor gears to provide you a favorite outdoor experiences in the nature. The REDCAMP Character: Higher Quality Customers First Our goal is to provide higher quality products with premium, unique features. All of our gears are thoughtfully designed and tested to exceed your expectation and we love to hear back from our customers about their user experience. Trust us, Trust yourself.
feature_bullets: 【2 Adjustable Heights】 This 3 foot folding table size is 36 x 24 inches, heights can be adjusted to 15 and 28 inches with the adjustable legs. The pack size is 24x18x3 inches when folded in half.

【Sturdy and Stable】 Tabletop thickness is 1.5 inches. Table leg tubes diameter 25mm. Finished with extra U shape side support and secure latch in the corner, ensures the fold up table sturdy enough in use.
【Easy to Set and Fold】 Set up the picnic table and chairs easily within several seconds. Quick to fold them together and take with the carry handle. Easy to clean the tabletop with a paper.
EASY TRANSPORT: To make this aluminum camping table easy for transportation we choose to use light weighted material and a sturdy handle special designed to keep it comfortable in your hands.

【Multi-purpose】:The portable folding table and chairs set can be used as picnic table for outdoor, grill side table for outside BBQ, serving table for dining, small patio table for adult and kids, metal camping table for beach, fishing, concert, sport events.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars100 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
